name: c2c moss stitch dishcloth
notes:
> **subscribe to my newsletter and get an exclusive 50% off coupon code for your first purchase!
> [subscribe here][2]**

the moss stitch is my go-to stitch whenever i want to crochet something easy.

> this pattern is part of my [6 different c2c crochet stitches: vol. 1](/patterns/sources/6-different-c2c-crochet-stitches-vol-1)
> ebook. save and get the ebook!

**you can find a video tutorial for the c2c moss stitch [here][1].**

i wrote this pattern for a dishcloth using the moss stitch, but this time it is worked from corner to corner.

** the pattern can be worked as a square or a rectangle.**

i think it looks so beautiful with multicolor yarn, but it will also look really good with a solid color.

the pattern is available for free on my blog.

return/refund policy: due to the fact that it is impossible to return a digital file, all sales are final.
